casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Ronald FARROW. No. 1P16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Southern Pines, for Farrow, Ronald. Richard L. Harrison, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 31st of December 2015 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 31st of December 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, New Hanover County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
